fields.name: text
fields.description: Required. The Markdown text to render in HTML.

fields.name: mode
fields.description: The rendering mode. Can be either markdown or gfm.Default: markdown

fields.name: context
fields.description: The repository context to use when creating references in gfm mode.  For example, setting context to octo-org/octo-repo will change the text #42 into an HTML link to issue 42 in the octo-org/octo-repo repository.

result.namespace_description: Render a Markdown document in raw mode
